global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Eastern Boundary (EB) line 2019-09-27T12:26:00 UTC and recovered 2019-11-05T15:00:21 UTC. The glider often experienced strong currents and had difficulty maintaining the EB line. On 2019-10-26 the glider experienced a GPS issue and was drifted on the surface until recovery.

platform.long_name: OOI Costal Pioneer 200m Slocum Glider cp_340
